segments.text: Over in the center, there's a boy on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into what appears to be a cookie jar inside an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His smaller companion, a girl, is watching him with keen interest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, clearly expecting a share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling a little at their covert operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so focused on their mission to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, that stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart skips a beat seeing how precariously balanced he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuinely frightening thought that he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the adult hasn't heard the creaking or rustling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're quite bold, these two, attempting this right in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, they don't get hurt or caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
